Title: Allows for reasonable accommodations for the examination portion of licensure requirements to become a social worker for individuals for whom English is not their primary language
Summary: Allows for reasonable accommodations for the examination portion of licensure requirements to become a social worker for individuals for whom English is not their primary language and a test in their primary language is not available.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing for reasonable accommodations for the examination portion of licensure requirements to become a social worker for individuals for whom English is not their primary language
